CHADS2_FORMULAS: Anual Stroke Risk; Hipocoagulation; CHADS² Score
CHADS2_ANUAL_STROKE_RISK_STUDY: Prevention of stroke in patients with atrial fibrillation: current strategies and future directions. British Medical Journal. Retrieved 30 December 2012.
CHADS2_SCORE_LEGEND: C - Congestive Heart Failure [+1]; H - Hypertension [+1]; A - Age >= 75 years [+1]; D - Diabetes Mellitus [+1]; S² - Prior Stroke, TIA or Thromboembolism [+2];
CHADS2_AGE_TXT: Please choose an apropriate age interval
CHADS2_CONGESTIVE_HEART_FAILURE_HISTORY_: Please indicate if the patient suffers from congestive heart failure.
CHADS2_HYPERTENSION_HISTORY_TXT: Please indicate if the patient suffers from hypertension.
CHADS2_STROKE_OR_TIA_OR_THROMBOEMBOLISM_: Please indicate if the patient has any Stroke, TIA or Thromboembolism history.
CHADS2_DIABETES_MELLITUS_TXT: Please indicate if the patient suffers from Diabetes Mellitus
